ai-patthana15.56:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.56:0.3_0: Instead, they should developing the skillful qualities.
ai-patthana15.56:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the unskillful qualities that should be given up by developing. Noble One gives rise to skillful qualities. No cause is a condition for cause.
ai-patthana15.56:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.56:2.1_0: You should give up the unskillful qualities that should not be given up by developing.
ai-patthana15.56:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.56:2.1_3: (These two discourses should be expanded in the previous discourse.)
